nodes.text: The Pharmalux Waste Processing facility was a waste processing plant run by Pharmalux Technologies in the lower levels of the Lower Industrial Sector of the moon Nar Shaddaa. During the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire, Agent Kalda Biss of the Republic Strategic Information Service led an operation that stopped the Imperial Commander Vergost from using the facility to wipe out most of the moon's alien population.
The Pharmalux Waste Processing facility appears as part of the Lower Industrial Sector on Nar Shaddaa in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare in 2011.
